conclusion: Analyze the paths from points A, B, C, and D to the containers.
A is connected to a black baffle.
The black baffle directs the flow downward.
The liquid will flow into container E.
B is connected to a yellow baffle.
The yellow baffle directs the flow downward.
The liquid will flow into container F.
C is connected to a blue baffle.
The blue baffle directs the flow downward.
The liquid will flow into container G.
D is connected to a white baffle.
The white baffle directs the flow downward.
The liquid will flow into container G.
Liquid from A will flow into container E.
Liquid from B will flow into container F.
Liquid from C will flow into container G.
Liquid from D will flow into container G.
The liquid from A will flow into container E, from B into container F, and from both C and D into container G.
